CommonUtils
 
ConnectionException
This exception is thrown when a connection to a node in the network is already established.
DuplicateConnectionException
This exception is thrown when a duplicate connection is detected in the blockchain network.

SimpleValidate
This class represents a simple validation method for blocks.

Represents a subnet in a blockchain network.
Transaction
This class represents a transaction between two wallets.
TransactionException
This class represents a custom exception for transaction-related errors.

This class represents a transaction notification message.
ValidateBlock
This abstract class represents a block validation message.
ValidateBlockRes
Class ValidateBlockRes extends ValidateBlock.
ValidateBlockRq
This class represents a request to validate a block in the blockchain.

This class represents a Wallet object.
